p: We then wanted to determine if the variable values (such as temperature) were differentially associated depending on the R 0 value. For this, we divided municipalities into three pairwise comparisons: 1 < R 0 â‰¤ 2 versus 2 < R 0; 1 < R 0 < 2.5 versus 2.5 < R 0; and 1 < R 0 < 3 versus 3 < R 0. Comparisons were done using Wilcoxon rank sum test.
